submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], target: List[int]) -> int:
        sign = 1 # if nums[0]<target[0] else -1
        track = []
        res=0
        for i in range(len(nums)):
            n = nums[i]
            t = target[i]
            diff = n-t
            if (n-t)*sign>0:
                track.append(abs(diff))
            else:
                # print('sign')
                # print(sign)
                # print('track')
                # print(track)
                res += self.impl(track)
                # print('res')
                # print(res)
                track = [abs(diff)]
                sign *= -1
        res+=self.impl(track)
        return res
    
    def impl(self, track):
        # print('impl')
        # print(track)
        if len(track)==0:
            return 0
        minv = 1000000
        for v in track:
            minv = min(minv, v)
        res = minv
        sub=[]
        for v in track:
            if v>minv:
                sub.append(v-minv)
            else:
                res+=self.impl(sub)
                sub = []
        res += self.impl(sub)
        # print('impl res')
        # print(res)
        return res
